THE MANAGEMENT CAPACITY PROGRAMME (MCP) ?IS FUNDED THROUGH THE ARTF, AND MANAGED DIRECTLY BY THE INDEPENDENT ?ADMINISTRATIVE REFORM AND CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION (IARCSC). MCP WILL ALSO ?PROVIDE SUPPORT TO THE IARCSC TO ENSURE EFFICIENT MANAGEMENT OF THE PROGRAMME. ?THE TOTAL ARTF COST OF MCP IS $30M OVER THREE YEARS
